pkgmetadata.longdescription: Working Examples for Reproducible Research Documents // Templates, guides, and scripts for writing documents in 'LaTeX' and 'R markdown' to produce guides, slides, and reports. Special care is taken to illustrate use of templates and customization opportunities. Challenges and opportunities of 'HTML' output from 'R markdown' receive special attention. Includes several vignettes to assist new users of literate programming.
